summary: "The Martian" is a 2015 science fiction movie directed by Ridley Scott and starring Matt Damon. It's about an astronaut stranded on Mars who fights to survive while NASA tries to bring him home. The film is based on Andy Weir's 2011 novel and features a star-studded cast. Filming took place in Hungary and Jordan. The movie was a critical and commercial success, earning over $630 million worldwide and receiving seven Academy Award nominations.
title: The Martian (film)
